title: Pilot
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Pilot>>
<<Portrait|Pilot_happy>>
What's up?
<</Textbox>>


    <<if $Clue1Found is true and ($Clue1Owner1 is "Pilot" or $Clue1Owner2 is "Pilot")>>
        [[What do you know about $Clue1?|Pilot.Question]]
<<endif>>
<<if $Clue2Found is true and ($Clue2Owner1 is "Pilot" or $Clue2Owner2 is "Pilot")>>
    [[What do you know about $Clue2?|Pilot.Question2]]
<<endif>>
<<if $Clue3Found is true and ($Clue3Owner1 is "Pilot" or $Clue3Owner2 is "Pilot")>>
    [[What do you know about $Clue3?|Pilot.Question3]]
<<endif>>
<<if $Clue4Found is true and ($Clue4Owner1 is "Pilot" or $Clue4Owner2 is "Pilot")>>
    [[What do you know about this clue?|Pilot.Question4]]
<<endif>>


    //<<if $Clue1Found is true and ($Clue1Owner1 != "Pilot" or $Clue1Owner2 != "Pilot")>> 
//[[Pilot.Redirect]]
//<<endif>>
  //  <<if $Clue2Found is true and ($Clue2Owner1 != "Pilot" or $Clue2Owner2 != "Pilot")>> 
//[[Pilot.Redirect2]]
//<<endif>>
  //  <<if $Clue3Found is true and ($Clue3Owner1 != "Pilot" or $Clue3Owner2 != "Pilot")>> 
//[[Pilot.Redirect3]]
//<<endif>>
  //  <<if $Clue4Found is true and ($Clue4Owner1 != "Pilot" or $Clue4Owner2 != "Pilot")>> 
//[[Pilot.Redirect4]]
//<<endif>>

//[[That's all.|Pilot.Bye]]

title: Pilot.Bye
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
I'll see you around.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Pilot>>
<<Portrait|Pilot_neutral>>
Whatever.
<</Textbox>>

//End of conversation

title: Pilot.Question
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Do you know anything about $Clue1?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Pilot>>
Oh that? That's mine
<</Textbox>>


[[I'll see you around.|Pilot.Bye]]

[[I found it in $Clue1Location.|Pilot.Clue]]

[[Are you sure?|Pilot.Upset]]

title: Pilot.Clue
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
I found it in $Clue1Location. Any ideas why?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Pilot>>
<<Portrait|Pilot_neutral>>
Why would it be in there?
<</Textbox>>

[[Why would someone would take it?|Pilot.Key]]

[[Just gonna ask questions?|Pilot.Upset]]

title: Pilot.Upset
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Are you sure?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Pilot>>
<<Portrait|Pilot_mad>>
Are you the one who fixes this damn ship?
<</Textbox>>

<< if visited ("Pilot.Loyalty")>>
[[Pilot.Bye]]
<<endif>>

[[Pilot.Loyalty]]
//End of conversation

title: Pilot.Key
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Any thoughts why someone would take it?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Pilot>>
<<Portrait|Pilot_neutral>>
No clue, dude.
<</Textbox>>

//Clue Key Dialogue

[[Pilot.Bye]]

title: Pilot.Loyalty
body: <<set $PilotLoyalty to $PilotLoyalty - 1>>

title: Pilot.Redirect
body:
[[I found this.|Pilot.RedirectClue]]

[[Nevermind.|Pilot.Bye]]

title: Pilot.RedirectClue
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
I found this $Clue1. Can you tell me anything about it?
<</Text>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Pilot>>
<<Portrait|Pilot_Neutral>>
I'm busy right now, go bother $Clue1owner1 and $Clue1Owner2 with that.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Sure.
<</Text>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Pilot>>
<<Portrait|Pilot_Neutral>>
Whatever.
<</Textbox>>
